about_me.des: Give me a challenge: I will be happy to solve, thrilled to present and delighted to explain it!

projects.jalpc: This project is my project. I use javescript to get repo's information all my repos have only one request.
projects.cpython: This project is other's project. I use another request to get repo's information.

career.cadence_description: Manage and work in a skunkworks team to design and deploy core software architecture changes: supporting new compilers, updating libraries, moving programming languages to newest standards and retiring others and more. As Project Lead, write specifications and develop Graphical User Interface (GUI) projects, such as exploring clock setup, visual debug of design synthesis and combinatorial loops. Influential in site leadership through organization of onsite events: technical conferences, fundraisers, presentation workshops, among others.
career.soton_description: Investigation on Iterative Learning Control (ILC) with Backstepping for autonomous surveillance with a quadrotor.
career.soton_position: Bachelor of Electrical and Electronics Engineering (Science without Borders)
career.4_impar_description: Develop and maintain web Content Management Systems (CMS).
career.cpejr_description: Responsible for divulging and improving knowledge of vision/goal/strategy triad and Key Process Indicators (KPI) inside the company.
career.ufmg_description: Final project: Automatic Fault Injection into SystemC Designs.
career.ufmg_position: Bachelor of Control and Automation Engineering (BEng)
